name: The Bastard Fairies
description: '''The Bastard Fairies''' were an American musical group from [[Los Angeles, California]], formed in 2005. They are described as an "[[internet phenomenon]]," becoming at one point the No. 18 Most Subscribed (All Time) Musicians and No. 31 Most Viewed (All Time) Musician on [[YouTube]]. They achieved a measure of fame for a non-musical reason, after releasing a promotional video that received media attention on [[Fox News]]. The band's debut album, ''Memento Mori'', was released in April 2007.
